name: Compare Datasets
natural_language_description: 这是 Compare Datasets 节点。主要用于: Compare two inputs for changes

infoBox.displayName: Items from different branches are paired together when the fields below match. If paired, the rest of the fields are compared to determine whether the items are the same or different
infoBox.name: infoBox
infoBox.natural_language_description: 参数名: Items from different branches are paired together when the fields below match. If paired, the rest of the fields are compared to determine whether the items are the same or different

mergeByFields.name: mergeByFields
mergeByFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields to Match | 默认值: {'values': [{'field1': '', 'field2': ''}]}

resolve.name: resolve
resolve.natural_language_description: 参数名: When There Are Differences | 默认值: includeBoth
available_options: Use a Mix of Versions (值: mix) - Output uses different inputs for different fields
Include Both Versions (值: includeBoth) - Output contains all data (but structure more complex)

fuzzyCompare.name: fuzzyCompare
fuzzyCompare.description: Whether to tolerate small type differences when comparing fields. E.g. the number 3 and the string '3' are treated as the same.
fuzzyCompare.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fuzzy Compare | 作用: Whether to tolerate small type differences when comparing fields. E.g. the number 3 and the string '3' are treated as the same. | 默认值: False

preferWhenMix.name: preferWhenMix
preferWhenMix.natural_language_description: 参数名: Prefer | 默认值: input1

exceptWhenMix.name: exceptWhenMix
exceptWhenMix.natural_language_description: 参数名: For Everything Except | 提示: Enter the names of the input fields as text, separated by commas

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: skipFields (值: None) - Fields that shouldn't be included when checking whether two items are the same
fuzzyCompare (值: None) - Whether to tolerate small type differences when comparing fields. E.g. the number 3 and the string '3' are treated as the same.
disableDotNotation (值: None) - Whether to disallow referencing child fields using `parent.child` in the field name
